subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Suárez, a striker from Uruguay, must serve the rest of his four-month ban for biting an opponent at the World Cup, but he will be allowed to practice with his club team, Barcelona, and attend games.
snippet: Suárez, a striker from Uruguay, must serve the rest of his four-month ban for biting an opponent at the World Cup, but he will be allowed to practice with his club team, Barcelona, and attend games.
